company: OptumLabs Inc., A subsidiary of UnitedHealth Group
description: Performed statistical analysis and built machine learning models in various projects relevant to healthcare.

projects.title: Analysis of current diagnosis and treatment paradigms of lung cancer
projects.description: Used healthcare claims data to find current trends in the diagnosis and treatment of lung cancer, as well as evaluating oncology centersand their current capabilities

projects.title: Patient phenotyping in stress induction experiments
projects.description: used a WaveNet Decoder and a pretrained encoder to create representation of stress response from physiological signals.

projects.title: Modeling of hospital admissions for the frail and aging population
projects.description: Fitted poisson and negative binomial models to assess the risk of inpatient stays for patients aged >= 65 years old.

projects.title: Public database mining for possible drug interactions causing adverse events
projects.description: Used the FDA Adverse Event Reporting System (FAERS) public database and developed an R package that will list drug interactions that will most likely create an adverse event.

projects.title: Patient classification on diabetes intervention success and participation
projects.description: Developed machine learning and statistical models that would help understand and predict metrics of success in a diabetes intervention

company: Bioprocess Engineering and Research Center, University of San Carlos
description: Designed and performed experiments in the development of commercial products (food ingeredients, nutraceuticals) from mango waste in collaboration with a biotech startup.

projects.title: Applied Design of experiments to construct efficient explorations of the parameter space.
Used statistical methods and software for inference and modeliing in experiments.
Used response surface methodology for the optimization of spray drying parameters to increase yields and product quality.

company: Engineering Mathematics Department, School of Engineering, University of San Carlos
description: Designed and performed experiments in the development of commercial products (food ingeredients, nutraceuticals) from mango waste in collaboration with a biotech startup.

projects.title: Taught trigonometry and differential calculus to undergraduate engineering and architecture students
